name: GetCustomerInfo
description:
Retrieve specific customer information from an eCommerce store.

Use this tool to get detailed information about a specific customer from an eCommerce store using their customer ID and store ID. Ideal for checking customer profiles, transaction histories, and personal information tied to their account.

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the eCommerce store.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a customer in a specific store. Required to fetch customer details.

value_schema.description: The id for the customer of a store.
